column1: 1A - CHAINED VOLUME OF RETAIL SALES SEASONALLY ADJUSTED, Index numbers of sales per week and percentage increase on a year earlier , SIC 2007, All businesses
This worksheet contains two tables presented vertically with one above the other and a blank row between the two tables
The monthly period consists of 4 weeks except for March, June, September and December which are 5 weeks. January 2020 is also a 5 week period.
Some cells in this table are empty because data was not collected for these variables at these time points.
